title: In 'True Story,' A Shamed Journalist Interviews A Fugitive Who Stole His Identity
teaser: In 2001, Michael Finkel was fired for making up a story. Then he learns that a suspected murderer is posing as him, so he gets to know him. The best word for the drama is "dumb," says David Edelstein.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
